As an introduction VerticalSwitch is offering 50% off all virtual solutions for the first 6 months.

https://portal.verticalswitch.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=23&carttpl=cart

**1 Core**

**1 GB RAM**

**5TB Transfer**

**30GB of SSD Diskspace**

**$5** per month after coupon **LOWENDTALK**



These servers are located in Newark Delaware.  We provide top notch support and a Free SSL Cert with each server.

This offer is good through the end of this month.  So please check us out and feedback is always appreciated.
